entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is being questioned by Hermione for allowing Dolores Umbridge to teach Defense Against the Dark Arts.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts who is upset with Dumbledore's decision to let Dolores Umbridge teach Defense Against the Dark Arts.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who tries to calm down Hermione and explain that Defense Against the Dark Arts teachers have always been difficult to find.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student at Hogwarts who agrees with Harry's explanation and also mentions Dolores Umbridge's suspicious behavior.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Crookshanks is Hermione's cat who jumps off her lap when she gets upset.

entities.name: dolores umbridge
entities.description: Dolores Umbridge is the new Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher who is being criticized by Hermione and Ron for her suspicious behavior.

relationships.description: Dumbledore has employed Dolores Umbridge as the new Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher.
